episodes.title: The Disturbing Life of a Polygamous Cult Leader’s Daughter
episodes.description: Naomi Wright is the daughter of a former polygamous cult leader. In this interview, she shares what she knows about her father’s rise to leadership, the psychology of cults, what it was like growing up in a polygamous family, and the hidden manipulation tactics the cult used — tactics that are disturbingly common in many cults that are active today. Extra Content ▶ https://almostfalse.net/supporters/videos/series/5188 Contact Naomi ▶ https://hub.almostfalse.net/podcast/55⁠ Website ▶ https://almostfalse.net Merch Store ▶ https://almostfalse.net/pages/merch Discord ▶ https://discord.gg/h4eeEt57jk
